author: OrdinaryMajestic4686
body: NTA. Ya family is quite dysfunctional, and you know that. So don't waste energy second-guessing yourself for them. Is your uncle a family member that gives you constructive criticism with your well-being in mind? My guess is no. Don't waste your time reflecting on words that weren't said with any consideration for you.

author: Buho45
body: F&A=AHs, F>A. OP you deserve better. Avoid toxic people especially when there is alcohol involved. Uncle is AH too.

author: Katerh
body: NTA. “The only ones “out of line” were my shitty, deadbeat father daring to complain about a gift he received that he didn’t deserve and my aunt for agreeing with him. My conscience is clean regarding everything that happened after that.”
